original_text: But there is something which happens to everyone. It happens to righteous people and it happens to wicked people. It happens to good people and it happens to bad people. It happens to people who are clean in front of God and it happens to people who are unclean. It happens to people who offer sacrifices to God and it happens to people who do not do that. It happens to good people and to people who turn away from God. It happens to people who make promises to God. It also happens to people who are afraid to do that.
korean_text: 모든 사람에게 임하는 그 모든 것이 일반이라 의인과 악인, 선한 자와 깨끗한 자와 깨끗하지 아니한 자, 제사를 드리는 자와 제사를 드리지 아니하는 자에게 일어나는 일들이 모두 일반이니 선인과 죄인, 맹세하는 자와 맹세하기를 무서워하는 자가 일반이로다

sentences.original_text: But there is something which happens to everyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모든 사람에게 일어나는 한 가지가 있다.

sentences.original_text: and it happens to wicked people.
and it happens to bad people.
It happens to people who are clean in front of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님 앞에서 깨끗한 사람들에게 일어난다.

sentences.original_text: and it happens to people who are unclean.
It happens to people who offer sacrifices to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님께 제물을 드리는 사람들에게 일어난다.

sentences.original_text: and it happens to people who do not do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그렇게 하지 않는 사람들에게도 일어난다.

sentences.original_text: and to people who turn away from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님께서 등을 돌린 사람들에게도 일어난다.

sentences.original_text: It happens to people who make promises to God.
It also happens to people who are afraid to do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그렇게 하는 것을 두려워하는 사람들에게도 일어난다.
